short_description: HD LED Display: PAIZOO Aquarium Thermometer adopts LED screen to display temperature, LED can provide wide viewing angle and the color is saturated, it is easier to read the data no matter day or night. Green environmental protection and energy saving

Cordless & Touch Design: Stick-on Induction Thermometer senses water temperature through probe, cordless design, no messy wires in the water, providing a clean and safe environment for fish.Touch the button to display the temperature, and the thermometer outside aquarium will enter the sleep state after 5s

High Accurate Display: Tank Thermometer Aquarium just needs to tear off the adhesive and stick it below the water level on the outside of the tank. The thermometer for terrarium has a reading range of 0-140 °F and is accurate to 0.9 °F. Up to 5s refresh speed allows the naked eye to detect temperature changes more quickly

Long Battery Life: The fish tank thermometer built-in 3V battery button, the battery is long-lasting. Mini design, easy to use. Digital thermometer is suitable for different water types such as fresh water, tap water, salt water, sea water, etc., to provide the most comfortable water environment for your beloved pets

100% Satisfied Customer Service: We provide 12-month warranty. In the event of any product quality defects within the warranty period, we will offer a free replacement without charge. name: Marineland 3 Feet Plastic Bamboo Plant, Décor For aquariums and Terrariums
short_description: 3-FOOT BAMBOO: Realistic plant ideal for aquariums and terrariums.
VERSATILE: Can be anchored to aquarium bottom or float freely in water.
FISH HABITAT: Provides a place for fish to hide, reducing stress.
EASY TO CLEAN: After drying overnight, remove any algae deposits with soft-bristled brush.
EASY CUSTOMIZATION: Marineland plants come in many varieties, sizes and styles to let you create beautiful aquascape effects.
product_description: At Marineland, innovation powers everything we do. From industry firsts to industry standards, Marineland products are designed with both performance and style in mind. We push precision and power beyond the expected and listen to our loyal customers to make our products even better. We do this because at the heart of our innovative spirit is a desire to help hobbyists everywhere do more, create more and, most of all, enjoy more. Make it Marineland. Creating a beautifully aqua-scaped aquarium is easy with Marineland décor. Decorations allow the aquarium to become a living piece of art, while providing cover for the fish, thus reducing fish stress. Marineland Bamboo is 3-foot long and is great for aquariums and terrariums. This low maintenance alternative to caring for live plants in your tank creates a more natural looking setting for your aquarium or terrarium. This product can be anchored to the bottom or float on top of water.

name: 7 Pcs Ceramic Aquarium Plant Pots, Aquarium Plant Holder Cups, Aquatic Planters for Fish Tank Decorations and Live Plant Cultivation
short_description: Fish Tank Accessories: The package includes 7 ceramic aquarium plant pots in 7 different styles. The sufficient quantity allows you to cultivate aquatic plants or decorate your fish tank with ease.

Quality and Serviceable: Made from reliable ceramic material, these aquatic planter cups feature a smooth surface and are reusable, non-toxic, and odorless. They are suitable for growing most types of aquatic plants and can be used for a long time.

Practical and Multipurpose: These ceramic aquarium plant holders are suitable for both freshwater and saltwater aquariums. With their novel and decorative designs, they not only support plant growth but also serve as attractive ornaments for aquariums.

Easy to Use: Simply choose the appropriate aquatic plant holder based on the shape and root system of your plants, place the aquatic plants inside, and arrange them as desired to enhance the visual appeal of your fish tank.

Warm Notes: These ceramic aquarium plant pot decorations are fragile, so please handle and store them with care. When not in use, they can be conveniently stored in drawers, cabinets, or storage boxes without taking up much space.
